Plot: Mobster Paul Vitti is released into Dr. Ben Sobol's care, where only more chaos ensues.
Title: Analyze That
Writer: Kenneth Lonergan (characters), Peter Tolan (characters), Peter Steinfeld, Harold Ramis, Peter Tolan
Actors: Robert De Niro, Billy Crystal, Lisa Kudrow, Joe Viterelli
tomatoConsensus: The one joke premise is stretched a bit thin in this messy sequel, but a few laughs can be had here and there.
